member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.ArgumentEscaper.EscapeAndConcatenateArgArrayForProcessStart(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary:
Undo the processing which took place to create string[] args in Main, so that the next process will receive the same string[] args
See here for more info: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/twistylittlepassagesallalike/archive/2011/04/23/everyone-quotes-arguments-the-wrong-way.aspx
